title: New: April Towers – Listener
content:
Less than a month after they first emerged, April Towers have returned with a new track from their debut ‘Peaks EP’ release.

‘Listener‘ demonstrates another exciting side to this developing two piece, with a lighter percussive base and cleaner, more crisp atmosphere than the industrial edge that pervaded through ‘Tel Aviv‘

While the 80’s pop sensibilities are still very, and brilliantly, present in ‘Listener‘, the chorus has a pang of Hot Chip and the same infectious rhythmic abilities that the British five piece are known for across the music listening world.

If you’re not already, get excited and tune in to ‘Listener‘
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
